cards.task: View a compact, annotated commit history
cards.description: Shows a condensed commit log with branch pointers and a text-based graph of the DAG.
cards.whenToUse: When you need to understand branch structure or recent activity quickly.
scenarios: Review prep: Check what's been merged before starting new work
Debugging: Visualize where a branch diverged from main
Release planning: See tags and branch tips to decide what's ready to ship

cards.task: Show recent commits with one line each
cards.description: Displays the last 10 commits in a compact single-line format.
cards.whenToUse: When you want a quick overview of recent commits.
scenarios: Quick check: See what's been committed recently
Find commit: Locate a specific commit to reference
Review: Scan recent history before pushing

cards.task: Show what changed in a specific commit
cards.description: Displays the commit message, author, date, and the actual diff of changes.
cards.whenToUse: When you want to see exactly what a commit changed.
scenarios: Code review: Examine what a specific commit introduced
Debug: See what changes might have caused an issue
Learning: Understand how a bug was fixed

cards.description: Shows the differences between two branches.
cards.whenToUse: When you want to see what changes a feature branch introduces.
scenarios: PR review: See all changes before merging
Conflict preview: Anticipate what might conflict
Progress check: See how much a branch has diverged

cards.task: Squash or reorder recent commits interactively
cards.description: Opens an interactive rebase for the last n commits so you can squash, reorder, or edit messages.
cards.whenToUse: Before pushing a branch or requesting review to produce a clean, logical commit history.
scenarios: PR hygiene: Squash fixup commits into a single coherent change
Message cleanup: Rewrite commit messages for clarity before review
History organization: Reorder commits so changes build logically
